definitions.definition: A person who practices mimicry ; especially:
An entity that mimics another entity, such as a disease that resembles another disease in its signs and symptoms; see the great imitator .
A fictional monster able to disguise itself as an inanimate object, commonly a treasure chest , often with the intent of luring adventurers into a trap .

main_definition: A person who practices mimicry ; especially:
secondary_definitions: An entity that mimics another entity, such as a disease that resembles another disease in its signs and symptoms; see the great imitator .
( fantasy , roleplaying games ) A fictional monster able to disguise itself as an inanimate object, commonly a treasure chest , often with the intent of luring adventurers into a trap .
